title: All Star Detective

see-also.note: All Star Detective Stories (US pulp magazine, 1929-1932)

additional-note: A note in the 1970 Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the May 1942 issue, and was filed in 1970.
